title: Transmission of rotary motion
creator_credit: Frank A. Goodlife, Science Films and British Council
brief_description: Gives a simple explanation of the transmission of rotary motion. Shows and disc usses examples of simple shafts, flexible shafting, gear drive, chain drive, and belt drive.
